mathakane suwanda saman.(witharagi: "suwanda saman")amage prema purane otunu palandinna onna menna kiyala indala maga harunu "prema kumar".kathawa nawathune suwanda samange jangamayage anke mithuriyage athata yamath ekkane.mithuriya katakara,dangakara hadakara tharuniyak.(ama wage ).kaleth ekka yodhayage "maha"premanwitha hala happili ekka amata du.ka gana amathakama wela yanawa suwanda samange.hadissiye suwanda saman amalage gedara enne oya athare.ama inne patalili godaka.yodhaya amage appachchitath wada darunu widihata "yodha paripalanayak"geniyaddi nidahase hadunu ama windawana kaleka.amala thamath inne kuli gedaraka kiyala suwanda saman dana ganneth oya gamanen.wenasak nopenwa inna suwanda saman uthsaha karanawa.maha premayak windina bawa pennanayi amage wayama.eeth uwamana wenne na.suwanda saman wenas wenne amage preme gana nodanamayi.suwanda saman yanne eddi genapu hitha amage gedara langa kunu kanuwe dala waga ama therum ganne kalekata passe.amage ara pranasama mithuriya saha suwanda saman dennama amagen nohithuwa wegen duras wenna patan gannawa.ama karanawa anumana kalath nohithu ikmanata prathyaksha wenne suwanda saman pita paren mithuriyage gedarata yanna enna patan gaththata passe.(apoyi!meka malpaththarayaka suwanda kathawak wegana eno kiyala ehema dos mure patan ganna epa.suwanda saman kiyala nama damme oonna oya karanawa nisamayi ;) )eeta passe kathawa harima saralayi sugamayi pahadiliyi.amata mithura saha prema kumar dennama ahimi wenawa.ama yodhayage kathawa thira pitapathak karala jiwitha sinamawata nanganawa.yodhayath ekka wiwaha giwisa gannawa.echcharayi.echcharomayi!
